name.pehl.piriti.restlet.client.json
Class JsonModelResponse<T>

java.lang.Object
  name.pehl.piriti.restlet.client.json.JsonModelResponse<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The model type
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.restlet.client.Uniform
public abstract class JsonModelResponse<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.restlet.client.Uniform

Convinience callback class which can be used together with PiritiJsonRepresentation: 

 ClientResource clientResource = new ClientResource("/resource/with/json/representation");
 clientResource.setOnResponse(new JsonModelResponse<Book>(Book.JSON)
 {
     @Override
     public void onSuccess(Book book, Request request, Response response)
     {
         ...
     }
     
     @Override
     public void onError(IOException error, Request request, Response response)
     {
         ...
     }
 });

Version:
$Date: 2010-10-20 12:07:37 +0200 (Mi, 20. Okt 2010) $ $Revision: 1124 $
Author:
$Author: harald.pehl $
